Methods in com.ibm.aglet with parameters of type ContextListener

Classes in com.ibm.aglets that implement ContextListener
 class ListenerList
          This class is used to hold a list of context listeners and to forward an event to each listener.
 

Methods in com.ibm.aglets with parameters of type ContextListener
 void AgletContextImpl.addContextListener(ContextListener listener)
          Adds the specified context listener to the listener lists, only if the listener is not already contained in the listener list and if the agent has the right permission.
 void AgletContextImpl.removeContextListener(ContextListener listener)
          Removes the specified context listener from the list.
